column2:
"All set? You're getting
transported right in front of
Dark Falz Elder. Hang tight."

"/face6 ...Guess we really cut that thing down to size.
Be strong. Remember all your
training. Come back to us safely. I believe in you."

"Dark Falz Elder has appeared! The malice
it exudes is overwhelming... However,
this is no time for fear! The combined
efforts of our forces are undefeatable!
Show no fear and don't hold back!

Think only of victory! All ARKS, engage!

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated, time runs out"
